meanings.sent1: The sluggardly cat slept all day in the sun.
meanings.sent2: He was often criticized for his sluggardly work ethic.
meanings.sent3: The sluggardly sloth refused to even lift a paw to reach for food.
meanings.sent4: Her sluggardly pace in completing tasks was like watching a snail race.
meanings.sent5: The sluggardly clouds drifted lazily across the sky, delaying the sunset.

meanings.definition: Slow-moving or sluggish in action or progress
meanings.sent1: The sluggardly traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The sluggardly river flowed gently through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The sluggardly computer took ages to load a simple webpage.
meanings.sent4: His sluggardly response to the urgent situation caused further delays.
meanings.sent5: The sluggardly turtle inched its way towards the finish line, much to the amusement of the spectators.
